title: Temptation
description: Forbidden love and impossible choices ...I'm a stay-at-home mum and happily married to my high school sweetheart.Sound familiar?Well, my guess is that's where the similarities end, because I've just returned to work, and my new boss is not only one of the wealthiest men in the country, he's also the sexiest man I've ever seen.Smart.Powerful.A gentleman.Bryce Clark gets everything he wants.And what he wants is me. Our chemistry is intense.Undeniable.Unavoidable.Unforgiving.Perhaps it's fate.Will I risk everything I've ever known and succumb to temptation?
author: K.M. Golland
